game_description: GuitarKingVR is the ultimate guitar simulation. Play different songs in different locations. Show your skills, grab the right chords, rock like hell. GuitarKingVR is more than just playing air guitar, you get what you play! The flying picks show you the way, anyone can become a Guitar King. Switch from beginner to rockstar mode and show the world your skills. Are you ready to rock?
review_1: Gameplay method works really well. Looking forward to see how this develops with more songs and maybe a campaign. Would good if the notes also represented up and down strums.
review_2: this app rocks! very cool play dynamic, hope to see more songs in the future.
